member.name: EmfType
member.summary: The EmfType enumeration specifies the nature of the records that are placed in an Enhanced Metafile (EMF) file. This enumeration is used by several constructors in theMetafile class.

member.name: EmfType.EmfTypeEmfOnly
member.summary: Specifies that all of the records in the metafile are EMF records, which can be displayed by GDI or GDI+.

member.name: EmfType.EmfTypeEmfPlusOnly
member.summary: Specifies that all of the records in the metafile are EMF+ records, which can be displayed by GDI+ but not by GDI.

member.name: EmfType.EmfTypeEmfPlusDual
member.summary: Specifies that all EMF+ records in the metafile are associated with an alternate EMF record. Metafiles of type EmfTypeEmfPlusDual can be displayed by GDI or by GDI+.
